author: Deepa Seetharaman
title: Facebook Loses Virtual-Reality Headset Coding Lawsuit Against ZeniMax - WSJ

organizations.name: facebook loses virtual-reality headset coding lawsuit against zenimax - wsj facebook inc.

text:
Facebook Inc. and its co-defendants were ordered to pay $500 million to ZeniMax Media Inc. after a jury found the social networkâ€™s Oculus VR unit unfairly used ZeniMax code to build a virtual-reality headset.

The verdict Wednesday was another setback for Oculus, which Facebook bought in 2014 for more than $2 billion. The unit already was... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
